title: delete old DAG files in .ethash
body:
I am using geth Version: 1.5.5-unstable on Ubuntu 16.04. I am playing on a private testnet and mine on this machine. The `.ethash` folder is growing out of control (see example below). I would suggest auto-deleting old DAG files that are not required anymore.
